channel.title: Request - A template banner :/
channel.description:
Im currently building a website, and have been looking through various banners, and came across this [url=Http://Redresort.com]one[/url]
I was wondering if anyone was up to the job of making something similar (not the same ofcouse :/) The colors would have to be either blue,black,white or red. Aswell as having the logo attached included where it stands out easily.
The size/dementions would need to be around 1300x200-400 (a fare banner size) Aswell as buttons would be a bonus =).
If someone could do this that would be awsome. It must have a small bordering color, perferably black or grey.
Thank you =)
P.s. If/When your done could you please attach the psd aswell? thanks
EDIT: Woops seems as if ive posted in the wrong area, could a mod or admin please move this to the request thread?

item.title: Request - A template banner :/
item.dc:creator: @MoO MoO
item.description:
@MoO wrote:

Im aware of the size, i still need a 1300x 200-400 banner and i was aware of that, sorry fastbawlz

Read full topic

item.title: Request - A template banner :/
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

MoO:

The size/dementions would need to be around 1300x200-400

1300 width wonâ€™t show up properly on most computers because most people use a screen size of 1024x768, not to mention the browser.

MoO:

P.s. If/When your done could you please attach the psd aswell? thanks

And also, the banner on the site you linked to was done in flash, not photoshop.

Read full topic
